title: gati tarum kaDavuLai
sahitya:
gati tarum kaDavuLai tudittiDum toNDarkkuk-kavalai uNDO manamE


anupallavi

  shrutiyuDan isaiyena shuDaruDan kadirena shuddha manam kalandu tittikkum sukhamAgik-


caraNam    Urunnai vaidAlum yAr sati sheidAlum urudiyAi irundu nI uLLanbu sheiguvAi
sUriya jyOtiyai sUrai aNaikkumO sutantara yOgiyait-tollaigaL vaLaikkumO
